类 MobConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.MobConstants

public final class MobConstants
extends Object
    The constants used in mob.

      • MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD
        If the size of a mob file is less than this value, it's regarded as a small file and needs to be merged in mob compaction. The default value is 1280MB.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD

        public static final long DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_MERGEABLE_THRESHOLD
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT

        public static final String MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT
        The max number of del files that is allowed in the mob file compaction. In the mob compaction, when the number of existing del files is larger than this value, they are merged until number of del files is not larger this value. The default value is 3.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_DELFILE_MAX_COUNT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE
        The max number of the mob files that is allowed in a batch of the mob compaction. The mob compaction merges the small mob files to bigger ones. If the number of the small files is very large, it could lead to a "too many opened file handlers" in the merge. And the merge has to be split into batches. This value limits the number of mob files that are selected in a batch of the mob compaction. The default value is 100.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_BATCH_SIZE
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD

        public static final String MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD
        The period that MobCompactionChore runs. The unit is second. The default value is one week.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD

        public static final int DEFAULT_MOB_COMPACTION_CHORE_PERIOD
        另请参阅:
